award_title: Support for the International Institute for Applied Systems Analysis (IIASA)
subject: Re: models that don't get reused
body:
Hans,

Most computational work gets published then disappears. Even solid methods don't get picked up because they're stuck in PDFs or messy repos.

We built Ouro to fix thatâ€”makes it easy to share tools and datasets in a way people can actually run and build on.

Given IIASA's focus on systems analysis and global collaborations, might be useful for extending the reach of your team's computational work.

Happy to show you quickly if it's relevant.

Hope you have a good holiday.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
